name: Kensington Corridor Trust
description:
The Kensington Corridor Trust (KCT) is a neighborhood trust focused on protecting and maintaining long-term affordability on commercial corridors such as Kensington Avenue. Through local partnerships, strategic real-estate planning, and long-term trust vehicle, KCT aims to ensure the survival and revitalization of small local neighborhoods. 

This organization part of the Philadelphia Justice and Equity Fellowship

https://kensingtoncorridortrust.org/
